description:
--> Watch How A Magical Kiss Can Turn Anyone Into A Real Prince 
--> Fun interactions - Wholesome family fun for you & your children - HD graphics 

The Princess and the Frog is a beautiful interactive & magical production of one of the most famous fairy tales by the Brothers Grimm. Teach your children one of the most important lessons in life how not to judge a book by its cover. Enjoy amazing interactive activities, superb animation and brilliant sound effects your children are sure to enjoy. 

- What’s Inside: 
--> Join the princess & play ball in the palace's courtyard - fun activity 
--> Watch how the princess loses her ball - interactive animated activity 
--> Help the princess & forest animals search for the ball - fun activity 
--> Watch how the princess makes a promise to the Frog - animated characters 
--> Join the King, his daughters and the frog to a royal dinner - interactive activity 
--> Feel the magic as the frog turns into a real prince - A joyous celebration 

This interactive storybook provides endless hours of pleasure, through its beautiful storyline, fascinating animated scenes, as well as its vivid and colorful animations and engaging interactions. 

Features: 
--> Beautiful HD illustrations joined with a rich narrative on every page 
--> Enjoy numerous engaging and fun animations on every page 
--> “Read to Me” - automatically reads each page of the story to you 
--> “Read it Myself” - allows you to control the reading yourself 
--> “Auto Play” - automatically reads the entire story to you 

ABOUT TabTale
With over 350 million downloads and growing, TabTale has established itself as the creator of pioneering virtual adventures that kids and parents love. TabTale’s interactive storybooks provide an exciting reading experience for the most beloved children's stories. Each book inspires young children’s creativity and imagination.
Visit us: http://www.tabtale.com/ 
Like us: http://www.facebook.com/TabTale
Follow us:@Tabtale
Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/iTabtale

CONTACT US 
Let us know what you think! Questions? Suggestions? Technical Support? Contact us 24/7 at WeCare@TabTale.com.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR PARENTS: 
* This App is free to play but certain in-game items may be purchased for real money. You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
* By downloading this App you agree to TabTale’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at http://tabtale.com/privacy-policy/ and at http://tabtale.com/terms-of-use/.
Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.

releaseNotes:
We wanted to say "Thank you!" to the millions of users that have downloaded our apps. Kids all over the world have fallen in love with Tabtale’s digital storybooks, so we’re rolling out an all new “Kids Book Club”.
Explore TabTale’s new all-in-one education center-- make learning fun with educational games & activities within each digital storybook!
Stay up to date to see the very best in educational apps and digital storybooks! 
Like us on Facebook at Facebook.com/tabtale
